name: Safety and Security at the Liberty Macvonden Building (ITC-1141-A)
name_original: Safety and Security at the Liberty Macvonden Building (ITC-1141-A)
description:
This is an "experience" created for So Bad It's Good Jam 2021. It is not a legitimate training application, and no information presented therein should be taken as factural.

  1. Download Interactive Training Application
  2. Extract with 7-zip
  3. Open ITALauncher
  4. Log in with work credentials
  5. Complete training and submit certificate to HR
